Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar stand
Description: Small asymmetrical ring stand with two convex lips, made from a common buff-coloured Nile clay that has been polished and coated with a dark red wash. Technical details of the manufacture are visible, particularly near the base which displays striations caused by removing the vessel from the wheel.
